channel.title: New Update Mask/Packet Discovered,Obj heights+Lumb Bank Finished!
channel.description:
I Did it :D so whats this new update mask ?
Simple : -Minimap Changement,this will refresh and send the packets to all the players that are online -I have found a way to put objects on any height! (whitout getting them on all heights) -I have made a Lumbridge bank like in Runescape
just take a look : The door updates when opening or closing it. (yes i got working doors and gates and ladders :p)
[img]http://img216.imageshack.us/img216/2245/minimapchangingkr5.png[/img]
And heres my half a day work !!!
[img]http://img299.imageshack.us/img299/6210/lumbybankal2.png[/img]
43 objects
See the Walls and Doors,objects (the doors are not red because thej do not have a closing option) Still need to add npcs Still need to add a portal (dunno to where yet) [size=15pt]IM LOOKING FOR A BLUE FLOORMAT ID[/size]
i think i may be able to add icons into the minimap im not 100% sure but it may be a npc or object,it can now be spotted whit the update mask.
i fucking pwnd u all :P
(u can comment on my bank)

item.title: New Update Mask/Packet Discovered,Obj heights+Lumb Bank Finished!
item.dc:creator: @getsome getsome
item.description:
@getsome wrote:

I Did it so whats this new update mask ?

Simple :
-Minimap Changement,this will refresh and send the packets to all the players that are online
-I have found a way to put objects on any height! (whitout getting them on all heights)
-I have made a Lumbridge bank like in Runescape

just take a look :
The door updates when opening or closing it. (yes i got working doors and gates and ladders :p)

And heres my half a day work !!!

43 objects

See the Walls and Doors,objects (the doors are not red because thej do not have a closing option)
Still need to add npcs
Still need to add a portal (dunno to where yet)
[size=15pt]IM LOOKING FOR A BLUE FLOORMAT ID[/size]

i think i may be able to add icons into the minimap im not 100% sure but it may be a npc or object,it can now be spotted whit the update mask.

i fucking pwnd u all

(u can comment on my bank)

Read full topic
